column5: Our home is great for groups, families, and a single individual. It is conveniently located:  30 minutes from Kemah,  40 minutes from NRG Stadium,  35 minutes from Downtown 30 minutes from NASA Space Center  Restaurants include: Iguana Joe’s, Caracol Restaurant, Pappasito’s  Landry’s, Goode Company, Monument Inn, Pappadeaux’s, Shula’s Steakhouse, Vic and Anthony’s, Perry’s Steakhouse and Davis Street   Shopping: 40 minutes to Bay Brook Mall, 45 minutes to the Galleria or Memorial City Mall.
column8: Lovely Home 5 Miles from Royal Purple Raceway
